name: Notification
desc: A container for information broadcast through a notification center to all registered observers.

items.name: object
items.desc: An object that the poster wishes to send to observers.

items.name: userInfo
items.desc: Storage for values or objects related to this notification.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: description
items.desc: A textual description of the notification.

items.name: debugDescription
items.desc: A textual description of the notification suitable for debugging.

items.name: customMirror
items.desc: A mirror that reflects the notification.

items.name: hashValue
items.desc: The computed hash value for the notification.
